item.title: Talked about RSS Feeds!
item.description: Tried to explain how RSS feeds can be really cool! and in your webpage <head> you should put <link href="feed.xml" rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="Lampbusters RSS Feed" />

item.title: New RSS Feed Added today!
item.description: Added in a new RSS feed in a way that causes an .xml file to be run as a php file by abusing the .htaccess file

item.title: And we may have gotten XSL to work!
item.description: Who would have thought XML/XSL would be such a pain in the gluteous maximus?
